body:
Comment 6 by **aka.spin**: 
It's works. But if after install run update command. For example:

    $ goinstall -u github.com/thoj/Go-MySQL-Client-Library

goinstall fails with next error:

    goinstall.exe: github.com/thoj/Go-MySQL-Client-Library: not
    a directory: c:/Users/spin/go/src/pkg/github.com/thoj/Go-MySQL-Client-Library
